sqlMap.statement:
SELECT 'SO' AS ORD_TYPE ,SO.TRX_HDR_NUM AS TRX_HDR_NUM ,SO_DI.SO_NUM AS ORD_NUM ,D_AC.DS_ACCT_NM AS DS_ACCT_NM ,SO_DI.OPS_FROM_HOUR_MN AS OPS_FROM_HOUR_MN ,SO_DI.OPS_TO_HOUR_MN AS OPS_TO_HOUR_MN ,SO_DI.SEC_CLNC_REQ_TXT AS SEC_CLNC_REQ_TXT ,SO_DI.INS_CERT_REQ_TXT AS INS_CERT_REQ_TXT ,SO_DI.FL_COV_TXT AS FL_COV_TXT ,SO_DI.TRCTR_AND_TRAIL_ACCS_TXT AS TRCTR_AND_TRAIL_ACCS_TXT ,SO_DI.LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_TXT AS LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_TXT ,SO_DI.RAMP_AVAL_TXT AS RAMP_AVAL_TXT ,SO_DI.STEP_AVAL_TXT AS STEP_AVAL_TXT ,SO_DI.INSD_STEP_NUM AS INSD_STEP_NUM ,SO_DI.OTSD_STEP_NUM AS OTSD_STEP_NUM ,SO_DI.FRONT_DOOR_AVAL_TXT AS FRONT_DOOR_AVAL_TXT ,SO_DI.BACK_DOOR_AVAL_TXT AS BACK_DOOR_AVAL_TXT ,SO_DI.PWR_OTLT_CONFIG_TXT AS PWR_OTLT_CONFIG_TXT ,SO_DI.SGN_ON_BLDG_RDSD_TXT AS SGN_ON_BLDG_RDSD_TXT ,SO_DI.BLDG_STRY_NUM AS BLDG_STRY_NUM ,SO_DI.BLDG_GURD_NTFY_TXT AS BLDG_GURD_NTFY_TXT ,SO_DI.INDL_PARK_TXT AS INDL_PARK_TXT ,SO_DI.BIZ_PARK_TXT AS BIZ_PARK_TXT ,SO_DI.PRO_BLDG_TXT AS PRO_BLDG_TXT ,SO_DI.SHPNG_CTR_TXT AS SHPNG_CTR_TXT ,SO_DI.PVT_RES_TXT AS PVT_RES_TXT ,SO_DI.BLDG_ENT_DOOR_HGT AS BLDG_ENT_DOOR_HGT ,SO_DI.BLDG_ENT_DOOR_WDT AS BLDG_ENT_DOOR_WDT ,SO_DI.CRDR_WDT AS CRDR_WDT ,SO_DI.DOOR_WDT AS DOOR_WDT ,SO_DI.SHPG_INSTN_CMNT_TXT AS SHPG_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,SO_DI.DELY_INSTN_CMNT_TXT AS DELY_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,SO_DI.ISTL_INSTN_CMNT_TXT AS ISTL_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,SO_DI.TECH_INSTN_CMNT_TXT AS TECH_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,SO_DI.ELEV_AVAL_TXT AS ELEV_AVAL_TXT ,SO_DI.ELEV_AVAL_FROM_HOUR_MN AS ELEV_AVAL_FROM_HOUR_MN ,SO_DI.ELEV_AVAL_TO_HOUR_MN AS ELEV_AVAL_TO_HOUR_MN ,SO_DI.ELEV_APPT_REQ_TXT AS ELEV_APPT_REQ_TXT ,SO_DI.ELEV_CTAC_PSN_NM AS ELEV_CTAC_PSN_NM ,SO_DI.ELEV_CTAC_TEL_NUM AS ELEV_CTAC_TEL_NUM ,SO_DI.ELEV_WDT AS ELEV_WDT ,SO_DI.ELEV_DEPTH_NUM AS ELEV_DEPTH_NUM ,SO_DI.ELEV_CAP_WT AS ELEV_CAP_WT ,SO_DI.ELEV_DOOR_HGT AS ELEV_DOOR_HGT ,SO_DI.ELEV_DOOR_WDT AS ELEV_DOOR_WDT ,SO_DI.DELY_INSTN_ADDL_CMNT_TXT AS DELY_INSTN_ADDL_CMNT_TXT ,SO_DI.VLD_USR_ID AS VLD_USR_ID ,CASE WHEN PSN.PSN_FIRST_NM IS NOT NULL AND PSN.PSN_LAST_NM IS NOT NULL THEN PSN.PSN_FIRST_NM || ' ' || PSN.PSN_LAST_NM WHEN PSN.PSN_FIRST_NM IS NOT NULL AND PSN.PSN_LAST_NM IS NULL THEN PSN.PSN_FIRST_NM WHEN PSN.PSN_FIRST_NM IS NULL AND PSN.PSN_LAST_NM IS NOT NULL THEN PSN.PSN_LAST_NM END AS VLD_USR_NM ,SO_DI.VLD_TS AS VLD_TS ,D_CDI.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK AS DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK ,D_CC.CPO_ORD_NUM AS CPO_ORD_NUM ,D_CC.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM AS DS_ORD_POSN_NUM ,D_CC.CONFIG_CATG_CD AS CONFIG_CATG_CD
,SO_DI.CMPY_INFO_FL_NM AS CMPY_INFO_FL_NM ,SO_DI.LOAD_DOCK_HGT AS LOAD_DOCK_HGT ,SO_DI.DELY_TRNSP_OPT_CD AS DELY_TRNSP_OPT_CD ,SO_DI.STAIR_CRAW_REQ_FLG AS STAIR_CRAW_REQ_FLG ,SO_DI.STAIR_AND_LDG_WDT AS STAIR_AND_LDG_WDT ,SO_DI.CUST_INFO_BO_FLG AS CUST_INFO_BO_FLG ,SO_DI.PICK_UP_XTR_TONER_FLG AS PICK_UP_XTR_TONER_FLG ,SO_DI.PICK_UP_AT_SAME_TM_FLG AS PICK_UP_AT_SAME_TM_FLG
FROM SHPG_ORD_DELY_INSTN SO_DI ,SHPG_ORD SO ,DS_CPO_CONFIG D_CC ,SELL_TO_CUST D_AC ,S21_PSN PSN ,DS_CPO_DELY_INFO D_CDI WHERE SO_DI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cMsg.glblCmpyCd_G1# AND SO_DI.SO_NUM = #cMsg.soNum_H1# AND SO_DI.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SO_DI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SO_DI.SO_NUM = SO.SO_NUM AND SO.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK = D_CC.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK(+) AND D_CC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_AC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.SHIP_TO_CUST_ACCT_CD = D_AC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD(+) AND D_AC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SO_DI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSN.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO_DI.VLD_USR_ID = PSN.PSN_CD(+) AND PSN.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_CDI.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.TRX_HDR_NUM = D_CDI.CPO_ORD_NUM(+) AND SO.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK = D_CDI.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK(+) AND D_CDI.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' UNION ALL SELECT 'RWS' AS ORD_TYPE ,RH.SRC_ORD_NUM AS TRX_HDR_NUM ,R_DI.RWS_NUM AS ORD_NUM ,RH.SHIP_FROM_ACCT_NM AS DS_ACCT_NM ,R_DI.OPS_FROM_HOUR_MN AS OPS_FROM_HOUR_MN ,R_DI.OPS_TO_HOUR_MN AS OPS_TO_HOUR_MN ,R_DI.SEC_CLNC_REQ_TXT AS SEC_CLNC_REQ_TXT ,R_DI.INS_CERT_REQ_TXT AS INS_CERT_REQ_TXT ,R_DI.FL_COV_TXT AS FL_COV_TXT ,R_DI.TRCTR_AND_TRAIL_ACCS_TXT AS TRCTR_AND_TRAIL_ACCS_TXT ,R_DI.LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_TXT AS LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_TXT ,R_DI.RAMP_AVAL_TXT AS RAMP_AVAL_TXT ,R_DI.STEP_AVAL_TXT AS STEP_AVAL_TXT ,R_DI.INSD_STEP_NUM AS INSD_STEP_NUM ,R_DI.OTSD_STEP_NUM AS OTSD_STEP_NUM ,R_DI.FRONT_DOOR_AVAL_TXT AS FRONT_DOOR_AVAL_TXT ,R_DI.BACK_DOOR_AVAL_TXT AS BACK_DOOR_AVAL_TXT ,R_DI.PWR_OTLT_CONFIG_TXT AS PWR_OTLT_CONFIG_TXT ,R_DI.SGN_ON_BLDG_RDSD_TXT AS SGN_ON_BLDG_RDSD_TXT ,R_DI.BLDG_STRY_NUM AS BLDG_STRY_NUM ,R_DI.BLDG_GURD_NTFY_TXT AS BLDG_GURD_NTFY_TXT ,R_DI.INDL_PARK_TXT AS INDL_PARK_TXT ,R_DI.BIZ_PARK_TXT AS BIZ_PARK_TXT ,R_DI.PRO_BLDG_TXT AS PRO_BLDG_TXT ,R_DI.SHPNG_CTR_TXT AS SHPNG_CTR_TXT ,R_DI.PVT_RES_TXT AS PVT_RES_TXT ,R_DI.BLDG_ENT_DOOR_HGT AS BLDG_ENT_DOOR_HGT ,R_DI.BLDG_ENT_DOOR_WDT AS BLDG_ENT_DOOR_WDT ,R_DI.CRDR_WDT AS CRDR_WDT ,R_DI.DOOR_WDT AS DOOR_WDT ,R_DI.SHPG_INSTN_CMNT_TXT AS SHPG_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,R_DI.DELY_INSTN_CMNT_TXT AS DELY_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,R_DI.ISTL_INSTN_CMNT_TXT AS ISTL_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,R_DI.TECH_INSTN_CMNT_TXT AS TECH_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,R_DI.ELEV_AVAL_TXT AS ELEV_AVAL_TXT ,R_DI.ELEV_AVAL_FROM_HOUR_MN AS ELEV_AVAL_FROM_HOUR_MN ,R_DI.ELEV_AVAL_TO_HOUR_MN AS ELEV_AVAL_TO_HOUR_MN ,R_DI.ELEV_APPT_REQ_TXT AS ELEV_APPT_REQ_TXT ,R_DI.ELEV_CTAC_PSN_NM AS ELEV_CTAC_PSN_NM ,R_DI.ELEV_CTAC_TEL_NUM AS ELEV_CTAC_TEL_NUM ,R_DI.ELEV_WDT AS ELEV_WDT ,R_DI.ELEV_DEPTH_NUM AS ELEV_DEPTH_NUM ,R_DI.ELEV_CAP_WT AS ELEV_CAP_WT ,R_DI.ELEV_DOOR_HGT AS ELEV_DOOR_HGT ,R_DI.ELEV_DOOR_WDT AS ELEV_DOOR_WDT ,R_DI.DELY_INSTN_ADDL_CMNT_TXT AS DELY_INSTN_ADDL_CMNT_TXT ,R_DI.VLD_USR_ID AS VLD_USR_ID ,CASE WHEN PSN.PSN_FIRST_NM IS NOT NULL AND PSN.PSN_LAST_NM IS NOT NULL THEN PSN.PSN_FIRST_NM || ' ' || PSN.PSN_LAST_NM WHEN PSN.PSN_FIRST_NM IS NOT NULL AND PSN.PSN_LAST_NM IS NULL THEN PSN.PSN_FIRST_NM WHEN PSN.PSN_FIRST_NM IS NULL AND PSN.PSN_LAST_NM IS NOT NULL THEN PSN.PSN_LAST_NM END AS VLD_USR_NM ,R_DI.VLD_TS AS VLD_TS ,D_CDI.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK AS DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK ,D_CC.CPO_ORD_NUM AS CPO_ORD_NUM ,D_CC.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM AS DS_ORD_POSN_NUM ,D_CC.CONFIG_CATG_CD AS CONFIG_CATG_CD
,R_DI.CMPY_INFO_FL_NM AS CMPY_INFO_FL_NM ,R_DI.LOAD_DOCK_HGT AS LOAD_DOCK_HGT ,R_DI.DELY_TRNSP_OPT_CD AS DELY_TRNSP_OPT_CD ,R_DI.STAIR_CRAW_REQ_FLG AS STAIR_CRAW_REQ_FLG ,R_DI.STAIR_AND_LDG_WDT AS STAIR_AND_LDG_WDT ,R_DI.CUST_INFO_BO_FLG AS CUST_INFO_BO_FLG ,R_DI.PICK_UP_XTR_TONER_FLG AS PICK_UP_XTR_TONER_FLG ,R_DI.PICK_UP_AT_SAME_TM_FLG AS PICK_UP_AT_SAME_TM_FLG
FROM RWS_DELY_INSTN R_DI ,RWS_HDR RH ,DS_CPO_CONFIG D_CC ,S21_PSN PSN ,DS_CPO_DELY_INFO D_CDI WHERE R_DI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cMsg.glblCmpyCd_G1# AND R_DI.RWS_NUM = #cMsg.rwsNum_H1# AND R_DI.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND R_DI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND R_DI.RWS_NUM = RH.RWS_NUM AND RH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RH.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK = D_CC.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK(+) AND D_CC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND R_DI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSN.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND R_DI.VLD_USR_ID = PSN.PSN_CD(+) AND PSN.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_CDI.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RH.SRC_ORD_NUM = D_CDI.CPO_ORD_NUM(+) AND RH.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK = D_CDI.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK(+) AND D_CDI.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'

SELECT 'SO' AS ORD_TYPE ,SO.TRX_HDR_NUM AS TRX_HDR_NUM ,SO.SO_NUM AS ORD_NUM ,D_AC.DS_ACCT_NM AS DS_ACCT_NM ,D_SS.LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_FROM_HOUR_MN AS OPS_FROM_HOUR_MN ,D_SS.LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_TO_HOUR_MN AS OPS_TO_HOUR_MN ,NULL AS SEC_CLNC_REQ_TXT ,NULL AS INS_CERT_REQ_TXT ,NULL AS FL_COV_TXT ,D_SS.TRCTR_AND_TRAIL_ACCS_FLG AS TRCTR_AND_TRAIL_ACCS_TXT ,D_SS.LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_FLG AS LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS RAMP_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS STEP_AVAL_TXT ,D_SS.INSD_STEP_NUM AS INSD_STEP_NUM ,D_SS.OTSD_STEP_NUM AS OTSD_STEP_NUM ,NULL AS FRONT_DOOR_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS BACK_DOOR_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS PWR_OTLT_CONFIG_TXT ,NULL AS SGN_ON_BLDG_RDSD_TXT ,NULL AS BLDG_STRY_NUM ,NULL AS BLDG_GURD_NTFY_TXT ,NULL AS INDL_PARK_TXT ,NULL AS BIZ_PARK_TXT ,NULL AS PRO_BLDG_TXT ,NULL AS SHPNG_CTR_TXT ,NULL AS PVT_RES_TXT ,D_SS.BLDG_ENT_DOOR_HGT AS BLDG_ENT_DOOR_HGT ,D_SS.BLDG_ENT_DOOR_WDT AS BLDG_ENT_DOOR_WDT ,D_SS.CRDR_WDT AS CRDR_WDT ,D_SS.DOOR_WDT AS DOOR_WDT ,NULL AS SHPG_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,D_CDI.DELY_ADDL_CMNT_TXT AS DELY_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,D_CII.ISTL_ADDL_CMNT_TXT AS ISTL_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,NULL AS TECH_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,D_SS.ELEV_AVAL_FLG AS ELEV_AVAL_TXT ,D_SS.ELEV_AVAL_FROM_HOUR_MN AS ELEV_AVAL_FROM_HOUR_MN ,D_SS.ELEV_AVAL_TO_HOUR_MN AS ELEV_AVAL_TO_HOUR_MN ,D_SS.ELEV_APPT_REQ_FLG AS ELEV_APPT_REQ_TXT ,D_SS.ELEV_CTAC_PSN_NM AS ELEV_CTAC_PSN_NM ,D_SS.ELEV_CTAC_TEL_NUM AS ELEV_CTAC_TEL_NUM ,D_SS.ELEV_WDT AS ELEV_WDT ,D_SS.ELEV_DEPTH_NUM AS ELEV_DEPTH_NUM ,D_SS.ELEV_CAP_WT AS ELEV_CAP_WT ,D_SS.ELEV_DOOR_HGT AS ELEV_DOOR_HGT ,D_SS.ELEV_DOOR_WDT AS ELEV_DOOR_WDT ,D_SS.SITE_SRVY_ADDL_CMNT_TXT AS DELY_INSTN_ADDL_CMNT_TXT ,NULL AS VLD_USR_ID ,NULL AS VLD_USR_NM ,NULL AS VLD_TS ,D_CC.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK AS DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK ,D_CC.CPO_ORD_NUM AS CPO_ORD_NUM ,D_CC.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM AS DS_ORD_POSN_NUM ,D_CC.CONFIG_CATG_CD AS CONFIG_CATG_CD
,D_SS.CMPY_INFO_FL_NM AS CMPY_INFO_FL_NM ,D_SS.LOAD_DOCK_HGT AS LOAD_DOCK_HGT ,D_SS.DELY_TRNSP_OPT_CD AS DELY_TRNSP_OPT_CD ,D_SS.STAIR_CRAW_REQ_FLG AS STAIR_CRAW_REQ_FLG ,D_SS.STAIR_AND_LDG_WDT AS STAIR_AND_LDG_WDT ,'N' AS CUST_INFO_BO_FLG ,'N' AS PICK_UP_XTR_TONER_FLG ,'N' AS PICK_UP_AT_SAME_TM_FLG
FROM SHPG_ORD SO ,DS_CPO_CONFIG D_CC ,SELL_TO_CUST D_AC ,DS_CPO_DELY_INFO D_CDI ,DS_CPO_ISTL_INFO D_CII ,DS_SITE_SRVY D_SS WHERE SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cMsg.glblCmpyCd_G1# AND SO.SO_NUM = #cMsg.soNum_H1# AND SO.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SO.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK = D_CC.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK AND D_CC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_AC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.SHIP_TO_CUST_ACCT_CD = D_AC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD(+) AND D_AC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_CDI.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.TRX_HDR_NUM = D_CDI.CPO_ORD_NUM(+) AND SO.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK = D_CDI.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK(+) AND D_CDI.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_CII.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.TRX_HDR_NUM = D_CII.CPO_ORD_NUM(+) AND SO.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK = D_CII.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK(+) AND D_CII.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_SS.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.TRX_HDR_NUM = D_SS.CPO_ORD_NUM(+) AND SO.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK = D_SS.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK(+) AND D_SS.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' UNION ALL SELECT 'RWS' AS ORD_TYPE ,RH.SRC_ORD_NUM AS TRX_HDR_NUM ,RH.RWS_NUM AS ORD_NUM ,RH.SHIP_FROM_ACCT_NM AS DS_ACCT_NM ,D_SS.LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_FROM_HOUR_MN AS OPS_FROM_HOUR_MN ,D_SS.LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_TO_HOUR_MN AS OPS_TO_HOUR_MN ,NULL AS SEC_CLNC_REQ_TXT ,NULL AS INS_CERT_REQ_TXT ,NULL AS FL_COV_TXT ,D_SS.TRCTR_AND_TRAIL_ACCS_FLG AS TRCTR_AND_TRAIL_ACCS_TXT ,D_SS.LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_FLG AS LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS RAMP_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS STEP_AVAL_TXT ,D_SS.INSD_STEP_NUM AS INSD_STEP_NUM ,D_SS.OTSD_STEP_NUM AS OTSD_STEP_NUM ,NULL AS FRONT_DOOR_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS BACK_DOOR_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS PWR_OTLT_CONFIG_TXT ,NULL AS SGN_ON_BLDG_RDSD_TXT ,NULL AS BLDG_STRY_NUM ,NULL AS BLDG_GURD_NTFY_TXT ,NULL AS INDL_PARK_TXT ,NULL AS BIZ_PARK_TXT ,NULL AS PRO_BLDG_TXT ,NULL AS SHPNG_CTR_TXT ,NULL AS PVT_RES_TXT ,D_SS.BLDG_ENT_DOOR_HGT AS BLDG_ENT_DOOR_HGT ,D_SS.BLDG_ENT_DOOR_WDT AS BLDG_ENT_DOOR_WDT ,D_SS.CRDR_WDT AS CRDR_WDT ,D_SS.DOOR_WDT AS DOOR_WDT ,NULL AS SHPG_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,D_CDI.DELY_ADDL_CMNT_TXT AS DELY_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,D_CII.ISTL_ADDL_CMNT_TXT AS ISTL_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,NULL AS TECH_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,D_SS.ELEV_AVAL_FLG AS ELEV_AVAL_TXT ,D_SS.ELEV_AVAL_FROM_HOUR_MN AS ELEV_AVAL_FROM_HOUR_MN ,D_SS.ELEV_AVAL_TO_HOUR_MN AS ELEV_AVAL_TO_HOUR_MN ,D_SS.ELEV_APPT_REQ_FLG AS ELEV_APPT_REQ_TXT ,D_SS.ELEV_CTAC_PSN_NM AS ELEV_CTAC_PSN_NM ,D_SS.ELEV_CTAC_TEL_NUM AS ELEV_CTAC_TEL_NUM ,D_SS.ELEV_WDT AS ELEV_WDT ,D_SS.ELEV_DEPTH_NUM AS ELEV_DEPTH_NUM ,D_SS.ELEV_CAP_WT AS ELEV_CAP_WT ,D_SS.ELEV_DOOR_HGT AS ELEV_DOOR_HGT ,D_SS.ELEV_DOOR_WDT AS ELEV_DOOR_WDT ,D_SS.SITE_SRVY_ADDL_CMNT_TXT AS DELY_INSTN_ADDL_CMNT_TXT ,NULL AS VLD_USR_ID ,NULL AS VLD_USR_NM ,NULL AS VLD_TS ,D_CC.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK AS DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK ,D_CC.CPO_ORD_NUM AS CPO_ORD_NUM ,D_CC.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM AS DS_ORD_POSN_NUM ,D_CC.CONFIG_CATG_CD AS CONFIG_CATG_CD
,D_SS.CMPY_INFO_FL_NM AS CMPY_INFO_FL_NM ,D_SS.LOAD_DOCK_HGT AS LOAD_DOCK_HGT ,D_SS.DELY_TRNSP_OPT_CD AS DELY_TRNSP_OPT_CD ,D_SS.STAIR_CRAW_REQ_FLG AS STAIR_CRAW_REQ_FLG ,D_SS.STAIR_AND_LDG_WDT AS STAIR_AND_LDG_WDT ,'N' AS CUST_INFO_BO_FLG ,'N' AS PICK_UP_XTR_TONER_FLG ,'N' AS PICK_UP_AT_SAME_TM_FLG
FROM RWS_HDR RH ,DS_CPO_CONFIG D_CC ,DS_CPO_DELY_INFO D_CDI ,DS_CPO_ISTL_INFO D_CII ,DS_SITE_SRVY D_SS WHERE RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cMsg.glblCmpyCd_G1# AND RH.RWS_NUM = #cMsg.rwsNum_H1# AND RH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RH.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK = D_CC.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK AND D_CC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_CDI.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RH.SRC_ORD_NUM = D_CDI.CPO_ORD_NUM(+) AND RH.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK = D_CDI.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK(+) AND D_CDI.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_CII.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RH.SRC_ORD_NUM = D_CII.CPO_ORD_NUM(+) AND RH.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK = D_CII.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK(+) AND D_CII.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_SS.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RH.SRC_ORD_NUM = D_SS.CPO_ORD_NUM(+) AND RH.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK = D_SS.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK(+) AND D_SS.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'

SELECT DISTINCT 'SO' AS ORD_TYPE ,SO.TRX_HDR_NUM AS TRX_HDR_NUM ,SO.SO_NUM AS ORD_NUM ,D_AC.DS_ACCT_NM AS DS_ACCT_NM ,D_SS.LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_FROM_HOUR_MN AS OPS_FROM_HOUR_MN ,D_SS.LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_TO_HOUR_MN AS OPS_TO_HOUR_MN ,NULL AS SEC_CLNC_REQ_TXT ,NULL AS INS_CERT_REQ_TXT ,NULL AS FL_COV_TXT ,D_SS.TRCTR_AND_TRAIL_ACCS_FLG AS TRCTR_AND_TRAIL_ACCS_TXT ,D_SS.LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_FLG AS LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS RAMP_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS STEP_AVAL_TXT ,D_SS.INSD_STEP_NUM AS INSD_STEP_NUM ,D_SS.OTSD_STEP_NUM AS OTSD_STEP_NUM ,NULL AS FRONT_DOOR_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS BACK_DOOR_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS PWR_OTLT_CONFIG_TXT ,NULL AS SGN_ON_BLDG_RDSD_TXT ,NULL AS BLDG_STRY_NUM ,NULL AS BLDG_GURD_NTFY_TXT ,NULL AS INDL_PARK_TXT ,NULL AS BIZ_PARK_TXT ,NULL AS PRO_BLDG_TXT ,NULL AS SHPNG_CTR_TXT ,NULL AS PVT_RES_TXT ,D_SS.BLDG_ENT_DOOR_HGT AS BLDG_ENT_DOOR_HGT ,D_SS.BLDG_ENT_DOOR_WDT AS BLDG_ENT_DOOR_WDT ,D_SS.CRDR_WDT AS CRDR_WDT ,D_SS.DOOR_WDT AS DOOR_WDT ,NULL AS SHPG_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,D_CDI.DELY_ADDL_CMNT_TXT AS DELY_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,D_CII.ISTL_ADDL_CMNT_TXT AS ISTL_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,NULL AS TECH_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,D_SS.ELEV_AVAL_FLG AS ELEV_AVAL_TXT ,D_SS.ELEV_AVAL_FROM_HOUR_MN AS ELEV_AVAL_FROM_HOUR_MN ,D_SS.ELEV_AVAL_TO_HOUR_MN AS ELEV_AVAL_TO_HOUR_MN ,D_SS.ELEV_APPT_REQ_FLG AS ELEV_APPT_REQ_TXT ,D_SS.ELEV_CTAC_PSN_NM AS ELEV_CTAC_PSN_NM ,D_SS.ELEV_CTAC_TEL_NUM AS ELEV_CTAC_TEL_NUM ,D_SS.ELEV_WDT AS ELEV_WDT ,D_SS.ELEV_DEPTH_NUM AS ELEV_DEPTH_NUM ,D_SS.ELEV_CAP_WT AS ELEV_CAP_WT ,D_SS.ELEV_DOOR_HGT AS ELEV_DOOR_HGT ,D_SS.ELEV_DOOR_WDT AS ELEV_DOOR_WDT ,D_SS.SITE_SRVY_ADDL_CMNT_TXT AS DELY_INSTN_ADDL_CMNT_TXT ,NULL AS VLD_USR_ID ,NULL AS VLD_USR_NM ,NULL AS VLD_TS ,NULL AS DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK ,D_CC.CPO_ORD_NUM AS CPO_ORD_NUM ,D_CC.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM AS DS_ORD_POSN_NUM ,D_CC.CONFIG_CATG_CD AS CONFIG_CATG_CD
,D_SS.CMPY_INFO_FL_NM AS CMPY_INFO_FL_NM ,D_SS.LOAD_DOCK_HGT AS LOAD_DOCK_HGT ,D_SS.DELY_TRNSP_OPT_CD AS DELY_TRNSP_OPT_CD ,D_SS.STAIR_CRAW_REQ_FLG AS STAIR_CRAW_REQ_FLG ,D_SS.STAIR_AND_LDG_WDT AS STAIR_AND_LDG_WDT ,'N' AS CUST_INFO_BO_FLG ,'N' AS PICK_UP_XTR_TONER_FLG ,'N' AS PICK_UP_AT_SAME_TM_FLG
FROM SHPG_ORD SO ,DS_CPO_CONFIG D_CC ,SELL_TO_CUST D_AC ,DS_CPO_DELY_INFO D_CDI ,DS_CPO_ISTL_INFO D_CII ,DS_SITE_SRVY D_SS WHERE SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cMsg.glblCmpyCd_G1# AND SO.SO_NUM = #cMsg.soNum_H1# AND SO.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK = D_CC.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK(+) AND D_CC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_AC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.SHIP_TO_CUST_ACCT_CD = D_AC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD(+) AND D_AC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_CDI.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.TRX_HDR_NUM = D_CDI.CPO_ORD_NUM(+) AND D_CDI.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_CII.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.TRX_HDR_NUM = D_CII.CPO_ORD_NUM(+) AND D_CII.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_SS.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.TRX_HDR_NUM = D_SS.CPO_ORD_NUM(+) AND D_SS.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'RWS' AS ORD_TYPE ,RH.SRC_ORD_NUM AS TRX_HDR_NUM ,RH.RWS_NUM AS ORD_NUM ,RH.SHIP_FROM_ACCT_NM AS DS_ACCT_NM ,D_SS.LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_FROM_HOUR_MN AS OPS_FROM_HOUR_MN ,D_SS.LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_TO_HOUR_MN AS OPS_TO_HOUR_MN ,NULL AS SEC_CLNC_REQ_TXT ,NULL AS INS_CERT_REQ_TXT ,NULL AS FL_COV_TXT ,D_SS.TRCTR_AND_TRAIL_ACCS_FLG AS TRCTR_AND_TRAIL_ACCS_TXT ,D_SS.LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_FLG AS LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS RAMP_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS STEP_AVAL_TXT ,D_SS.INSD_STEP_NUM AS INSD_STEP_NUM ,D_SS.OTSD_STEP_NUM AS OTSD_STEP_NUM ,NULL AS FRONT_DOOR_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS BACK_DOOR_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS PWR_OTLT_CONFIG_TXT ,NULL AS SGN_ON_BLDG_RDSD_TXT ,NULL AS BLDG_STRY_NUM ,NULL AS BLDG_GURD_NTFY_TXT ,NULL AS INDL_PARK_TXT ,NULL AS BIZ_PARK_TXT ,NULL AS PRO_BLDG_TXT ,NULL AS SHPNG_CTR_TXT ,NULL AS PVT_RES_TXT ,D_SS.BLDG_ENT_DOOR_HGT AS BLDG_ENT_DOOR_HGT ,D_SS.BLDG_ENT_DOOR_WDT AS BLDG_ENT_DOOR_WDT ,D_SS.CRDR_WDT AS CRDR_WDT ,D_SS.DOOR_WDT AS DOOR_WDT ,NULL AS SHPG_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,D_CDI.DELY_ADDL_CMNT_TXT AS DELY_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,D_CII.ISTL_ADDL_CMNT_TXT AS ISTL_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,NULL AS TECH_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,D_SS.ELEV_AVAL_FLG AS ELEV_AVAL_TXT ,D_SS.ELEV_AVAL_FROM_HOUR_MN AS ELEV_AVAL_FROM_HOUR_MN ,D_SS.ELEV_AVAL_TO_HOUR_MN AS ELEV_AVAL_TO_HOUR_MN ,D_SS.ELEV_APPT_REQ_FLG AS ELEV_APPT_REQ_TXT ,D_SS.ELEV_CTAC_PSN_NM AS ELEV_CTAC_PSN_NM ,D_SS.ELEV_CTAC_TEL_NUM AS ELEV_CTAC_TEL_NUM ,D_SS.ELEV_WDT AS ELEV_WDT ,D_SS.ELEV_DEPTH_NUM AS ELEV_DEPTH_NUM ,D_SS.ELEV_CAP_WT AS ELEV_CAP_WT ,D_SS.ELEV_DOOR_HGT AS ELEV_DOOR_HGT ,D_SS.ELEV_DOOR_WDT AS ELEV_DOOR_WDT ,D_SS.SITE_SRVY_ADDL_CMNT_TXT AS DELY_INSTN_ADDL_CMNT_TXT ,NULL AS VLD_USR_ID ,NULL AS VLD_USR_NM ,NULL AS VLD_TS ,NULL AS DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK ,D_CC.CPO_ORD_NUM AS CPO_ORD_NUM ,D_CC.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM AS DS_ORD_POSN_NUM ,D_CC.CONFIG_CATG_CD AS CONFIG_CATG_CD
,D_SS.CMPY_INFO_FL_NM AS CMPY_INFO_FL_NM ,D_SS.LOAD_DOCK_HGT AS LOAD_DOCK_HGT ,D_SS.DELY_TRNSP_OPT_CD AS DELY_TRNSP_OPT_CD ,D_SS.STAIR_CRAW_REQ_FLG AS STAIR_CRAW_REQ_FLG ,D_SS.STAIR_AND_LDG_WDT AS STAIR_AND_LDG_WDT ,'N' AS CUST_INFO_BO_FLG ,'N' AS PICK_UP_XTR_TONER_FLG ,'N' AS PICK_UP_AT_SAME_TM_FLG
FROM RWS_HDR RH ,DS_CPO_CONFIG D_CC ,DS_CPO_DELY_INFO D_CDI ,DS_CPO_ISTL_INFO D_CII ,DS_SITE_SRVY D_SS WHERE RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cMsg.glblCmpyCd_G1# AND RH.RWS_NUM = #cMsg.rwsNum_H1# AND RH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RH.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK = D_CC.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK(+) AND D_CC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_CDI.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RH.SRC_ORD_NUM = D_CDI.CPO_ORD_NUM(+) AND D_CDI.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_CII.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RH.SRC_ORD_NUM = D_CII.CPO_ORD_NUM(+) AND D_CII.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_SS.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RH.SRC_ORD_NUM = D_SS.CPO_ORD_NUM(+) AND D_SS.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'

SELECT DISTINCT 'SO' AS ORD_TYPE ,SO.TRX_HDR_NUM AS TRX_HDR_NUM ,SO.SO_NUM AS ORD_NUM ,D_AC.DS_ACCT_NM AS DS_ACCT_NM ,NULL AS OPS_FROM_HOUR_MN ,NULL AS OPS_TO_HOUR_MN ,NULL AS SEC_CLNC_REQ_TXT ,NULL AS INS_CERT_REQ_TXT ,NULL AS FL_COV_TXT ,NULL AS TRCTR_AND_TRAIL_ACCS_TXT ,NULL AS LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS RAMP_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS STEP_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS INSD_STEP_NUM ,NULL AS OTSD_STEP_NUM ,NULL AS FRONT_DOOR_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS BACK_DOOR_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS PWR_OTLT_CONFIG_TXT ,NULL AS SGN_ON_BLDG_RDSD_TXT ,NULL AS BLDG_STRY_NUM ,NULL AS BLDG_GURD_NTFY_TXT ,NULL AS INDL_PARK_TXT ,NULL AS BIZ_PARK_TXT ,NULL AS PRO_BLDG_TXT ,NULL AS SHPNG_CTR_TXT ,NULL AS PVT_RES_TXT ,NULL AS BLDG_ENT_DOOR_HGT ,NULL AS BLDG_ENT_DOOR_WDT ,NULL AS CRDR_WDT ,NULL AS DOOR_WDT ,NULL AS SHPG_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,NULL AS DELY_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,NULL AS ISTL_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,NULL AS TECH_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,NULL AS ELEV_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS ELEV_AVAL_FROM_HOUR_MN ,NULL AS ELEV_AVAL_TO_HOUR_MN ,NULL AS ELEV_APPT_REQ_TXT ,NULL AS ELEV_CTAC_PSN_NM ,NULL AS ELEV_CTAC_TEL_NUM ,NULL AS ELEV_WDT ,NULL AS ELEV_DEPTH_NUM ,NULL AS ELEV_CAP_WT ,NULL AS ELEV_DOOR_HGT ,NULL AS ELEV_DOOR_WDT ,NULL AS DELY_INSTN_ADDL_CMNT_TXT ,NULL AS VLD_USR_ID ,NULL AS VLD_USR_NM ,NULL AS VLD_TS ,D_CC.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK AS DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK ,D_CC.CPO_ORD_NUM AS CPO_ORD_NUM ,D_CC.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM AS DS_ORD_POSN_NUM ,D_CC.CONFIG_CATG_CD AS CONFIG_CATG_CD
,NULL AS CMPY_INFO_FL_NM ,NULL AS LOAD_DOCK_HGT ,NULL AS DELY_TRNSP_OPT_CD ,NULL AS STAIR_CRAW_REQ_FLG ,NULL AS STAIR_AND_LDG_WDT ,'N' AS CUST_INFO_BO_FLG ,'N' AS PICK_UP_XTR_TONER_FLG ,'N' AS PICK_UP_AT_SAME_TM_FLG
FROM SHPG_ORD SO ,DS_CPO_CONFIG D_CC ,SELL_TO_CUST D_AC WHERE SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cMsg.glblCmpyCd_G1# AND SO.SO_NUM = #cMsg.soNum_H1# AND SO.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK = D_CC.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK(+) AND D_CC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_AC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND SO.SHIP_TO_CUST_ACCT_CD = D_AC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD(+) AND D_AC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT 'RWS' AS ORD_TYPE ,RH.SRC_ORD_NUM AS TRX_HDR_NUM ,RH.RWS_NUM AS ORD_NUM ,RH.SHIP_FROM_ACCT_NM AS DS_ACCT_NM ,NULL AS OPS_FROM_HOUR_MN ,NULL AS OPS_TO_HOUR_MN ,NULL AS SEC_CLNC_REQ_TXT ,NULL AS INS_CERT_REQ_TXT ,NULL AS FL_COV_TXT ,NULL AS TRCTR_AND_TRAIL_ACCS_TXT ,NULL AS LOAD_DOCK_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS RAMP_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS STEP_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS INSD_STEP_NUM ,NULL AS OTSD_STEP_NUM ,NULL AS FRONT_DOOR_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS BACK_DOOR_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS PWR_OTLT_CONFIG_TXT ,NULL AS SGN_ON_BLDG_RDSD_TXT ,NULL AS BLDG_STRY_NUM ,NULL AS BLDG_GURD_NTFY_TXT ,NULL AS INDL_PARK_TXT ,NULL AS BIZ_PARK_TXT ,NULL AS PRO_BLDG_TXT ,NULL AS SHPNG_CTR_TXT ,NULL AS PVT_RES_TXT ,NULL AS BLDG_ENT_DOOR_HGT ,NULL AS BLDG_ENT_DOOR_WDT ,NULL AS CRDR_WDT ,NULL AS DOOR_WDT ,NULL AS SHPG_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,NULL AS DELY_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,NULL AS ISTL_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,NULL AS TECH_INSTN_CMNT_TXT ,NULL AS ELEV_AVAL_TXT ,NULL AS ELEV_AVAL_FROM_HOUR_MN ,NULL AS ELEV_AVAL_TO_HOUR_MN ,NULL AS ELEV_APPT_REQ_TXT ,NULL AS ELEV_CTAC_PSN_NM ,NULL AS ELEV_CTAC_TEL_NUM ,NULL AS ELEV_WDT ,NULL AS ELEV_DEPTH_NUM ,NULL AS ELEV_CAP_WT ,NULL AS ELEV_DOOR_HGT ,NULL AS ELEV_DOOR_WDT ,NULL AS DELY_INSTN_ADDL_CMNT_TXT ,NULL AS VLD_USR_ID ,NULL AS VLD_USR_NM ,NULL AS VLD_TS ,D_CC.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK AS DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK ,D_CC.CPO_ORD_NUM AS CPO_ORD_NUM ,D_CC.DS_ORD_POSN_NUM AS DS_ORD_POSN_NUM ,D_CC.CONFIG_CATG_CD AS CONFIG_CATG_CD
,NULL AS CMPY_INFO_FL_NM ,NULL AS LOAD_DOCK_HGT ,NULL AS DELY_TRNSP_OPT_CD ,NULL AS STAIR_CRAW_REQ_FLG ,NULL AS STAIR_AND_LDG_WDT ,'N' AS CUST_INFO_BO_FLG ,'N' AS PICK_UP_XTR_TONER_FLG ,'N' AS PICK_UP_AT_SAME_TM_FLG
FROM RWS_HDR RH ,DS_CPO_CONFIG D_CC WHERE RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cMsg.glblCmpyCd_G1# AND RH.RWS_NUM = #cMsg.rwsNum_H1# AND RH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D_CC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND RH.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK = D_CC.DS_CPO_CONFIG_PK(+) AND D_CC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'
SELECT SO_MSG_DESC_TXT FROM SHPG_ORD_MSG WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cMsg.glblCmpyCd_G1# AND SO_NUM = #cMsg.soNum_H1# AND SO_MSG_TP_CD = #soMsgTpCd# AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY TXT_SQ_NUM
SELECT NVL(MAX(TXT_SQ_NUM), 0) TXT_SQ_NUM FROM SHPG_ORD_MSG WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cMsg.glblCmpyCd_G1# AND SO_NUM = #cMsg.soNum_H1# AND SO_MSG_TP_CD = #soMsgTpCd# AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT SOCD.POST_CD AS POST_CD ,SOCD.CTRY_CD AS CTRY_CD FROM SHPG_ORD SO ,SHPG_ORD_CUST_DTL SOCD WHERE SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cMsg.glblCmpyCd_G1# AND SO.SO_NUM = #cMsg.soNum_H1# AND SO.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SOCD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SO.SO_NUM = SOCD.SO_NUM AND SOCD.SO_CUST_DATA_TP_CD = #soCustDataTpShipTo# AND SOCD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' UNION ALL SELECT RH.FROM_LOC_POST_CD AS POST_CD ,RH.FROM_LOC_CTRY_CD AS CTRY_CD FROM RWS_HDR RH WHERE RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cMsg.glblCmpyCd_G1# AND RH.RWS_NUM = #cMsg.rwsNum_H1# AND RH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT NVL(MAX(RM.RWS_MSG_SQ_NUM), 0) TXT_SQ_NUM FROM RWS_MSG RM WHERE RM.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cMsg.glblCmpyCd_G1# AND RM.RWS_NUM = #cMsg.rwsNum_H1# AND RM.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
